com.lab111.labwork5
Class TableRelationImpl

java.lang.Object
  com.lab111.labwork5.TableRelationImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
FieldSetObserver
public class TableRelationImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements FieldSetObserver

Class that implements tables relation on some field sets. It uses an 'observer' pattern to get notified of events on primary table. Also, it serves as 'mediator' cause it implements business logic of these events processing by propagating changes to related table.

Author:
freil
